body:
Needed:
 - [x] Fix router merging
 - [x] httpz integration
 - [x] New middleware syntax
 - [x] Fix faulty SolidJS types
 - [x] Add E2E test for type inference from Rust to Typescript (for `@rspc/client`, `@rspc/react` and `@rspc/solid`)
 - [x] Refactor `@rspc/react` to copy tRPC as close as possible -> Better inference and removing RQ context.
 - [x] Refactor `@rspc/solid` to copy the new React types/methods.
 - [x] Upgrade `@rspc/react` to use Typescript helpers & not hold the React Query context like `@rspc/solid` does.
 - [x] Unit test selection macro Specta output
 - [x] Move examples out into a dedicated crate only using Axum.
 - [x] Clean up & open souce httpz
 - [x] Remove `KeyAndKind`
 - [x] Move from `/rspcws` to `/rspc/ws`
 - [x] Fix subscriptions - Probably split add/remove subscriptions out of core into an abstraction
 - [x] Remove clone bound on TCtx and use `ctx_fn()` many times?
 - [x] Httpz support for accessing request + fix `axum` and `cookies` examples
 - [x] Hack back in Axum extractors + rerelease httpz
 - [x] Make middleware work
      - [x] incoming context switching
      - [x] response
      - [x] every item in stream
 - [x] Fix execute syntax
 - [x] Fix Tauri integration
 - [x] Remove all `todo!()`'s, `.unwrap()`'s, etc
 - [x] Rename `arg` to `input` everywhere
 - [x] Add my standard Rust lints
 - [x] Fix all clipping warnings
 - [x] ~~`useInfiniteQuery` and `createInfiniteQuery`~~
 - [x] ~~`createSubscription`~~
 - [x] Fix `@rspc/solid` in Mattrax & example project
 - [x] Redo documentation website
     - [x] Mobile navbar
     - [x] Fix initial flash when loading docs site
 - [x] Redo documentation
 - [x] Community upgrades:
     - [ ] ~~PR to Prisma Client Rust - upgrade version, upgrade Typescript examples on docs page & add unit tests for TS exporting~~
     - [x] Upgrade Spacedrive
     - [x] Upgrade Twidge
     - [x] Upgrade Mattrax
 - [x] Release
